rationale: Technical audit failed to identify any assets meeting the mandatory threshold of MA5 Bias < -2.5% and Volume Ratio > 1.2. Market liquidity is currently stagnant with all volume ratios significantly below 1.0 (mean ~0.48). 513050 (China Internet) shows the strongest negative bias (-1.94%) but lacks the volume confirmation (0.52) required for a high-conviction mean-reversion entry. Macro data absence necessitates a defensive stance.
